DOC.brief_summary: Use two high SPF sunscreen actual use condition .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Sunscreens Under Actual Use Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate difference level sunburn ( erythema ) protection follow single period natural sunlight exposure afford application SPF 50+ SPF 100+ sunscreen .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males Females Fitzpatrick Skin Types IIII 2 . At least 18 year old 3 . Able read , write , speak understand English language . 4 . Has personally read , sign , date Informed Consent Form ( include HIPAA disclosure ) Photograph Release 5 . Generally good health base medical history report subject 6 . Healthy male female subject history evidence clinically relevant medical disorder , determine brief medical history interview . 7 . Willing able follow study instruction , include : Remain outdoors least 5 hour Day 1 study face neck uncover ( much possible ) Apply test product ( sunscreen ) designate side face neck Remove makeup , sunscreen , facial product baseline prior apply test product . Use test product place current sun protection topical skincare product ( include makeup ) Attend schedule visit intend successfully complete study Return ALL study product Day 2 exit visit Refrain use sunscreen product tan bed use duration study . 1 . Individuals know allergy sensitivity sunscreens ingredient contain test product common topical skincare product , include adhesive . 2 . Observable Sunburn ( erythema score 0.5 ) face neck determine PI designee . 3 . Women know pregnant nursing . 4 . Individuals disease condition skin ( e.g. , active [ i.e . flare ] eczema psoriasis , skin cancer , polymorphic light eruption ( PMLE ) , systemic lupus erythematous ( SLE ) , xerodermapigmentosa ) could interfere study increase risk subject . 5 . Individuals selfreported UNCONTROLLED metabolic condition , diabetes , hypertension , hyper/hypothyroidism , hypercholesterolemia 6 . Subjects take medication chronic condition may make subject sun sensitive ( e.g. , Tetracyclines , antifungal , certain diuretic , etc . ) 7 . Skin diseases test site ( e.g. , photosensitivity disorder , etc . ) , may influence outcome study 8 . Wearing full head cover ski mask . 9 . An individual condition PI 's judgment make candidate inappropriate subject study participation 10 . Subjects related person involve directly indirectly conduct study ( i.e. , PI , subinvestigators , study coordinator , site personnel , employee Johnson & Johnson subsidiary , contractor Johnson & Johnson , family ) 11 . Individuals condition situation , PI 's opinion , may put subject significant risk , may confound study result , may interfere significantly subject 's participation study 12 . Individual view PI able complete study
